result.eng: The work is attributed to Leonardo da Vinci.
result.ga: Cuirtear an saothar i leith Leonardo da Vinci
result.orig: Cuirtear an saothar i leith Leonardo da Vinci
result.html: Cuirtear an saothar i leith Leonardo da VinciThe work is attributed to Leonardo da Vinci.
result.ponchtml: Cuirtear an saoṫar i leiṫ Leonardo da VinciThe work is attributed to Leonardo da Vinci.

result.eng: An underground train is called metro.
result.ga: Cuirtear meitreo ar thraein faoi thalamh

result.html: Cuirtear meitreo ar thraein faoi thalamhAn underground train is called metro.
result.ponchtml: Cuirtear meitreo ar ṫraein faoi ṫalaṁAn underground train is called metro.

result.eng: Don't put an article before the noun in this case.
result.ga: Ná cuirtear an t-alt roimh an ainmfhocal sa chás seo
